author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Four Seasons Resort Palm Beach Hosts Four Seasons Undercover, a Pop-up dining and entertainment experienceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Four Seasons Resort Palm Beach Hosts Four Seasons Undercover, a Pop-up dining and entertainment experience
Four Seasons Resort Palm Beach announces a new pop-up dinner shrouded by mystery. Taking place on Friday, September 25, 2015 from 5:30 to 10:00 pm, guests will only know when to arrive and where to go. From there, the event’s mysteries – from the theme to the menu – will be revealed one by one.
This exclusive, reservations-only experience is part of a series of Four Seasons Undercover events taking place at Four Seasons hotels and resorts across North America. Each event uses lighting, music and extravagant decorations, as well an over-the-top menu, to carry out its theme in the most intricate detail. These secret adventures offer guests a chance to engage all of their senses of sights, sounds and flavours, with a tantalising element of surprise.
Four Seasons Undercover at Four Seasons Resort Palm Beach will include at least four distinct dining and entertainment experiences never before offered to guests, led by Executive Chef Tory Martindale and Executive Pastry Chef Bashar al Shamali. Guests will be armed only with the necessary information to arrive ready to flow with the theme of the night, wherever it may take them. With only 30 available, tickets are USD 150 per person, excluding tax and gratuity.
Source:-Four Seasons
